mapper.select: SELECT cs.id, cs.station_name, cs.station_code, cs.sort, cs.line_code, cs.line_name, cs.warning_status, cs.open_status FROM cs_station cs LEFT JOIN work_area_station was ON was.station_code = cs.station_code WHERE cs.del_flag = 0 AND was.work_area_code = #{code}

SELECT cs.id, cs.line_name, cs.station_name, cs.phone_num as stationPhoneNum, cs.warning_status, cs.open_status, sd.depart_phone_num, sd.depart_name, sd.org_code FROM cs_station cs LEFT JOIN work_area_station was ON was.station_code = cs.station_code LEFT JOIN work_area_org wao ON wao.work_area_code = was.work_area_code LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.org_code = wao.org_code where cs.station_name = #{stationName} GROUP BY sd.org_code
SELECT id, warning_status, open_status FROM cs_station WHERE station_name = #{positionPanel.stationName}
SELECT id, username, realname, avatar FROM sys_user WHERE del_flag = 0 AND org_code= #{orgCode}
